description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom & Broccolini Miso Curry With Crispy Tofu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Japanese curry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mushroom,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Vegan,Tofu,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mushroom & Broccolini Miso Curry With Crispy Tofu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Steamed rice and wasabi peas (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a saucepan over high heat. Add mushroom and cook for 5 minutes, tossing often. Reduce heat to medium, add onion, garlic and curry powder and cook for 3 minutes or until fragrant.
Mix miso paste with 1 cup water until smooth. Stir into mushroom mixture. Add pumpkin and simmer for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, coat tofu in cornflour, shaking off excess. Heat remaining oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Cook tofu for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden.
Blanch broccolini and beans in boiling water for 1 minute. Drain.
Serve curry, tofu, greens and onion over rice and topped with peas.
